author: yorickdowne
content:
If it helps at all from another dude listening to calls 
Speculators will speculate. Whatever.
Consensus upgrade work is looking great. I’d say late 2021 is still possible though not super likely. Fiddy percent? Q1 2022 is looking like a really solid target, but let’s allow for things to go awry. 75%. 90% q2. 99% any time during 2022
